statements: SELECT * FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_status = 'Processing';
SELECT id, return_order_id, return_date FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_method = 'Courier';
SELECT return_order_id, return_reason FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_status, return_method FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_reason = 'Damaged' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, return_status, return_method FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT return_order_id, return_date FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_status = 'Pending' AND return_method = 'Courier'
SELECT id, return_reason FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY return_date ASC
SELECT return_order_id, return_method FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%'
SELECT * FROM reverse_logistics WHERE return_status = 'Declined' ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM ReverseLogistics;
SELECT return_date, return_reason FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM SupplyChainSystems;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM ReverseLogistics ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_reason, customer_id FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE product_id = 456;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, customer_id, product_id FROM ReverseLogistics;
SELECT return_id, return_reason, product_id, return_date, customer_id FROM ReverseLogistics ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_reason, customer_id, product_id FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT return_id, return_reason, customer_id, product_id FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damage%';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainSystems ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReverseLogistics;
SELECT customer_id, return_date, reason FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM SupplyChainSystems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT return_id, processing_time, cycle_start_date FROM ReturnCycleTimes WHERE processing_time > 5 ORDER BY processing_time ASC;
SELECT product_id, customer_id, return_date, reason FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE reason LIKE '%damaged%' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT reason, return_date FROM ReverseLogistics WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_location FROM SupplyChainSystems WHERE system_type = 'Warehouse';
SELECT return_id, MAX(processing_time) AS max_processing_time FROM ReturnCycleTimes GROUP BY return_id ORDER BY max_processing_time DESC;
SELECT r.return_id, r.return_date, s.system_name FROM ReverseLogistics r JOIN SupplyChainSystems s ON r.customer_id = s.system_id;
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT shipment_tracking_number, shipment_status FROM logistics WHERE logistics_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT p.product_name, r.return_date, l.shipment_tracking_number FROM products p JOIN returns r ON p.product_id = r.customer_id JOIN logistics l ON r.return_id = l.return_id WHERE p.product_category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM ReverseLogisticsOrders WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM ReverseLogisticsOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM WarehouseInventory WHERE location = 'Main Warehouse'
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM SupplierRelationships ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT return_date, return_reason, return_status FROM ReturnProcessing WHERE return_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM ReverseLogisticsOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, returned_items FROM ReverseLogisticsOrders WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM SupplierRelationships;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM WarehouseInventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM ReturnProcessing WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
